meta.title: High-Converting Websites on Clean Code — Web Studio Code-art.dev
meta.description: We build fast, responsive, and SEO-optimized websites from scratch — no templates or builders. Custom solutions that deliver results.
meta.keywords: web studio, website development, clean code websites, custom websites, high-conversion sites, responsive design, SEO websites, web agency

HomeSection.title: THE SITE DECIDES
HomeSection.question:
Do you want your business to 
 make money?

FeatureSection.title:
Why should you 
 Work with us?

feature_1.name: You don't need a technical specification
feature_1.description: Your task is to tell us about your problem, and we will create a technical specification and find the best solutions to solve it.

feature_2.name: You don't overpay for unnecessary managers
feature_2.description: We are a small team focused on results. You communicate directly with specialists without wasting time on a manager.

feature_3.name: Speed ​​and price democracy
feature_3.description: By following Elon Musk's principles, we were able to speed up our processes compared to other agencies. First, we create the most necessary website features.

site_1.name: Landing page
site_1.description: Car sales, franchise, course sales, road sign sales, accounting

site_2.name: Multipage site
site_2.description: Art materials, food delivery, dry ice sales, food sales, travel agency

SalePointSection.title:
Your site is not just 
 code, but a magnet for 
 customers and profits!
SalePointSection.message:
We will always be in touch with you and 
 help with any questions or problems!

TeamSection.title: Our team
TeamSection.description: We are a team of creative developers, designers, and marketers who have come together to create effective, stylish, and technologically advanced web solutions.

developer_1.name: Fedir Alpatov
developer_1.description: I make sure that your websites work smoothly, quickly, and without surprises. I write code, customize functionality, and make sure everything looks exactly as the designer intended (hi, Diana!). I love clean code, sugar-free coffee, and challenges that make me excited.

developer_2.name: Diana Merkotun
developer_2.description: I am responsible for ensuring that each of our websites is not only functional but also attractive to users. I work on the logic of interfaces, colors, fonts, and all the details that create a comfortable experience of interaction with the site.

ReviewsSection.title:
Reviews - what our 
 clients  say about us

card_1.name: Volodymyr
card_1.task: Develop a food delivery marketplace and landing page for a franchise
card_1.description: A professional team that truly knows their craft! We ordered a corporate website, and the result exceeded our expectations. The design is stylish, everything runs smoothly, and most importantly, it's user-friendly for our clients.

card_2.name: Viktor
card_2.task: Develop a food delivery marketplace and landing page for a franchise

card_3.name: Ivanna
card_3.task: Create a landing page redesign that attracts new customers to our services
card_3.description: I am very pleased with the result! The team created a modern and clear landing page that really helps to attract new customers. Everything was fast, professional and tailored to my wishes.

card_4.name: Volodymyr
card_4.task: Develop a food delivery marketplace and landing page for a franchise
card_4.description: A professional team that truly knows their craft! We ordered a corporate website, and the result exceeded our expectations. The design is stylish, everything runs smoothly, and most importantly, it's user-friendly for our clients.

card_5.name: Eugenia
card_5.task: Create a website for my charity foundation Angels of Tails
card_5.description: The site met all the requirements, I was just delighted! I am very grateful to the team for their help in creating a high-quality and user-friendly website. It has become a convenient tool for attracting partners to the foundation.

card_6.name: Volodymyr
card_6.task: Develop a food delivery marketplace and landing page for a franchise
card_6.description: A professional team that truly knows their craft! We ordered a corporate website, and the result exceeded our expectations. The design is stylish, everything runs smoothly, and most importantly, it's user-friendly for our clients.
